name: G.U.A.R.D
description:
You have just recently bought your piece of land; an entire planet, in fact. You plan to start your own civilization on this earth, but a storm of asteroids has arrived, endangering your planet. Fight to survive by destroying these meteors with the Galactic Unyielding Armored Rotational Defense. Your G.U.A.R.D will decimate anything and everything that falls in its path.

Move with the mouse

Click to fire

P to pause
